Control Name: 1.16 Ensure IAM policies that allow full *:* administrative privileges are not attached
Control Statement: It is recommended and considered a standard security advice to grant least privilegethat is, granting only the permissions required to perform a task. Determine what users need to do and then craft policies for them that let the users perform only those tasks, instead of allowing full administrative privileges.
